meanings.sent1: The computer screen showed a pixellated image of a cat.
meanings.sent2: The game character looked pixellated on the old console.
meanings.sent3: The pixellated photo made the dog's fur look like tiny squares.
meanings.sent4: Her memories of the event were pixellated, fragmented like a digital puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The artist used a pixellated effect to create a unique and modern painting.

meanings.sent1: The billboard displayed a pixellated advertisement for a new phone.
meanings.sent2: The TV screen showed a pixellated image of the city skyline.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly said her outfit looked pixellated, like a digital fashion statement.
meanings.sent4: The room was so dark that even his thoughts seemed pixellated, unclear and fragmented.
meanings.sent5: The artist intentionally created a pixellated effect on the mural to represent technology.

meanings.definition: Having a blocky appearance due to being displayed in pixels.
meanings.sent1: The video game character moved in a pixellated world of squares and colors.
meanings.sent2: The old photograph became pixellated when zoomed in too much.
meanings.sent3: The pixellated graphics on the screen reminded him of a retro arcade game.
meanings.sent4: His dreams felt pixellated, like a glitch in a digital reality.
meanings.sent5: The artist used a pixellated style to give a nostalgic feel to the artwork.
